1.0.name: wordpress/page-management
1.0.description:
Page Management is a plugin that allows a sites' pages to be managed easily. "Page Management" allows admin users to: * Reorder pages using "drag and drop". * Choose the number of pages that the author can see at the same time so that the author can see all the site's pages at the same time. * Allow authors to hide subpages so they can see the pages more easily.

Page Management has options to: * Hide subpages by default. * Remove pagination from the pages/posts editing pages - so you can see all the posts or pages at the same time.

Page Management's features include: * Multilingual (languages are currently Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish) * Regular updates. * Support.
